venue.name: Council Chambers of the Municipal Building

item.description:
Please join Dennis Himes at the Monday December, 13th Town Hall Meeting to peacefully demonstrate that the public would like a true separation of Church and State on the local government level. It is unconstitutional to have prayers at public meetings which disregards the diversity of beliefs of its denizens.

The meeting will be held at 6 p.m. on Monday the 13th in the Council Chambers of the Municipal Building at 550 Main Street in Hartford. We will be sitting down during the opening prayer, and reciting the Pledge of Allegiance in its original form (i.e. without "under God").

group.name: Atheist Humanist Society of CT and RI

item.name: Hartford Town Meeting
